snippet.title: Geneforge 1 - Mutagen Kickstarter!
snippet.description:
Spiderweb Software, Inc., makers of fine indie adventures for 25 years, announces a new Kickstarter campaign for an old cult classic! Twenty years ago, we released Geneforge, a truly unique and innovative fantasy sci-fi hybrid. Now, with the help of our fans, we are ready to give it a glorious remaster for Windows, Mac, and iPad.

If you would like to know more or to take part in recreating this glorious series, visit our Kickstarter at

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/geneforge1/geneforge-1-mutagen
